product_name: Primal Wear Trace Bike Jersey - Women's - 2011 Overstock
long_description: With bold floral style for your ride, the women's Primal Wear Trace Bike Jersey in black keeps you comfortable thanks to moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric. Double-knit polyester fabric pulls moisture away from body and pushes it to the outside fabric face, helping keep you cool and dry as you pedal. UPF 35 sun protection. Sublimated graphics are brilliantly bold and do not inhibit breathability. Hidden 3/4-length front zipper; 3 back pockets. Droptail hem offers extended coverage in back; sport cut is not too tight and not too loose. Primal Wear Trace Bike Jersey for women sports raglan sleeves with off-shoulder seams for comfort. Overstock.
short_description: With bold floral style for your ride, the women's Primal Wear Trace Bike Jersey in black keeps you comfortable thanks to moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric.
